item.title: Page Errors - "This website is under heavy load (request timed out)"
item.description:
Oct 4, 17:58 MDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 4, 17:45 MDT
Monitoring - Our engineering team has identified the issue and has implemented a fix. This fix is being monitored.

Oct 4, 17:34 MDT
Investigating - Some users are experiencing the following page error when attempting to access Canvas:

"This website is under heavy load (request timed out)
We're sorry, too many people are accessing this website at the same time. We're working on this problem. Please try again later."

Our engineering team is currently investigating this issue. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: Some students cannot open Credentials/Badges from Canvas
item.description:
Oct 3, 12:49 MDT
Resolved - This issue should now be resolved. Please reach out to support@badgr.com if you experience issues.

Oct 3, 10:12 MDT
Identified - Our Engineering team is actively investigating and working to correct the 500 error. At this time only users in the US are experiencing the LTI failure .

Oct 3, 09:05 MDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue where students are receiving a 500 error when attempting to access Credentials/Badges in their Canvas course. This is only affecting the 1.1 LTI and not the 1.3 LTI.

item.title: Canvas logs, or Weblogs (including user agents), are currently not queryable. Any queries targeting Weblogs will result in Error 503.
item.description:
Sep 29, 09:56 MDT
Resolved - The engineering team will continue to work on a fix while keeping the mentioned functionality disabled for the time of the investigation.

Sep 29, 05:16 MDT
Update - As an effort to prevent a wider incident and maintain Canvas Data 2 main functionality and uptime, the ability to query Weblogs (including user agents) was temporarily turned off for customers in North America (us-east-1 AWS Region, or IAD). The team is currently investigating the impact of queries targeting Weblogs on overall performance of CD2.

Sep 29, 02:58 MDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Intermittent login issues for Credentials/Badge customers on US server
item.description:
Sep 19, 06:16 MDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 18, 18:51 MDT
Identified - We are currently experiencing intermittent issues for our US customers when they attempt to log in to badgr.com. This is due to an issue with AWS servers in US-WEST-2 Region. We are hoping this will be resolved soon.

item.title: Commons Regionalization - Content Migration (EU, Canada and APAC)
item.description:
Aug 19, 07:28 MDT
Resolved - The migration has been completed.

Aug 19, 01:13 MDT
Identified - We are currently deploying the new Commons regions and performing a migration so every Commons instance is hosted from their respective areas. Some inconsistencies can be experienced within the new (EU, Canada, and APAC) regions while using Commons. Please do not make any changes (e.g. adding/updating/removing/favoriting/importing resources) to any Commons content. Such changes during this window will be lost after the transfer is complete.

item.title: Canvas Credentials support email service is experiencing a delay
item.description:
Jul 21, 12:16 MDT
Resolved - The issue has been resolved.

Jul 21, 08:35 MDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 21, 08:34 MDT
Identified - The support team may not be receiving some emails sent to customer support. Our System Admins are looking into the issue and we suspect they will be retrieved, however there will be a delay not typical to our normal support responses because of this.

Jul 6, 23:22 MDT
Investigating - Some users reported not being able to open cases when selecting the "Report a problem" option within Canvas. We are currently investigating this issue. If you are unable to reach us via this method, we would recommend contacting us via phone, chat or by emailing us on support@instructure.com
